channel.title: Turning Point
channel.description: Dr. David Jeremiah's Turning Point Delivers the Unchanging Word of God to an Ever-Changing World
channel.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
channel.itunes:summary: Dr. David Jeremiah's Turning Point Delivers the Unchanging Word of God to an Ever-Changing World

item.title: The Ancient of Days, Part 2
item.description: From the earliest civilizations to the latest news headlines, the truth is plain to see: the governments of this world are fragile and doomed to fail. Dr. David Jeremiah reminds us that the kingdom of Christ is neither. It will reign forever.
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.itunes:summary: From the earliest civilizations to the latest news headlines, the truth is plain to see: the governments of this world are fragile and doomed to fail. Dr. David Jeremiah reminds us that the kingdom of Christ is neither. It will reign forever.

item.title: A Fiery Furnace and a Fiery Faith, Part 1
item.description: Do you have the courage of your convictions? You won’t know the answer when life is going well; the true test happens when the heat is on. Dr. David Jeremiah sets the stage for one of the Bible’s most vivid examples of someone demonstrating faith under fire.
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.itunes:summary: Do you have the courage of your convictions? You won’t know the answer when life is going well; the true test happens when the heat is on. Dr. David Jeremiah sets the stage for one of the Bible’s most vivid examples of someone demonstrating faith under fire.

item.title: The End of World Government, Part 1
item.description: He was king of the world, ruling with absolute power and unrelenting wickedness. So why did a glimpse of the future leave Nebuchadnezzar so frightened? Dr. David Jeremiah takes a closer look at that devastating prophecy as he continues his series in the book of Daniel.
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.itunes:summary: He was king of the world, ruling with absolute power and unrelenting wickedness. So why did a glimpse of the future leave Nebuchadnezzar so frightened? Dr. David Jeremiah takes a closer look at that devastating prophecy as he continues his series in the book of Daniel.

item.title: Seven Reasons Why I Tithe, Part 2
item.description: If you’re a Christian, how do you practice your faith? By bearing fruit? By serving others? What about tithing – did that make your list? Dr. David Jeremiah explains why giving back to God is a discipline that puts your faith in action.
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.itunes:summary: If you’re a Christian, how do you practice your faith? By bearing fruit? By serving others? What about tithing – did that make your list? Dr. David Jeremiah explains why giving back to God is a discipline that puts your faith in action.

item.title: God's Basic Plan for Security
item.description: The world tells us that accumulating wealth and possessions is the path to lasting joy. But God’s Word says that’s a lie, and gives us a better way. Dr. David Jeremiah highlights the night-and-day differences between investing in earthly treasures and making heavenly investments.
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.itunes:summary: The world tells us that accumulating wealth and possessions is the path to lasting joy. But God’s Word says that’s a lie, and gives us a better way. Dr. David Jeremiah highlights the night-and-day differences between investing in earthly treasures and making heavenly investments.
